title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: In the SWT example ControlExample, under the Text tab, there is an issue where the ControlExampleText component emits a beeping sound when the user selects the SWT.MULTI style. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: When selecting the SWT.MULTI style in the ControlExampleText component, a beeping sound is emitted.
EB: The ControlExampleText component should not emit a beeping sound when selecting the SWT.MULTI style.
SR:
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Go to the Text tab.
3. Click on Styles SWT.SINGLE.
4. Click on Styles SWT.MULTI.
5. Observe if a beeping sound is emitted.
